description.p:
You can install translations that are not at least 95% completed through this addon. Presently it includes:
Arabic (ar_SA)
Azerbaijani (az_AZ)
Catalan (ca_ES)
Czech (cs_CZ)
Greek (el_GR)
Spanish (es)
Spanish - Spain (es_ES)
Basque (eu_ES)
Galician (gl_ES)
Italian (it_IT)
Macedonian (mk_MK)
Polish (pl)
Polish - Poland (pl_PL)
Portuguese (pt)
Portuguese - Portugal (pt_PT)
Portuguese - Brazil (pt_BR)
Russian (ru)
Russian - Russia (ru_RU)
Serbian (Cyrillic) (sr_SP)
Turkish (tr_TR)
Vietnamese (vi_VN)
If you want to add a new translation or provide help for a given language please read
https://doc.nuxeo.com/nxdoc/how-to-translate-the-nuxeo-platform/
